revision.comment: [[Help:Cat-a-lot|Cat-a-lot]]: Copying from [[Category:Awards disestablished in 1991]] to [[Category:1991 disestablishments in the Soviet Union]]
revision.text:
{{Infobox Military Award |name=Order of the October Revolution |image=[[File:Order of the October Revolution rus.jpg|150px]] |caption=The Order of the October Revolution |awarded_by=the {{flag|Soviet Union}} |type=Single-grade order |eligibility=Soviet and foreign citizens and institutions, including military units and administrative areas |for= "Services furthering [[communism]] or the state, or in enhancing the defences of the [[Soviet Union]]" |campaign= |status=No longer awarded |description= |clasps= |established=October 31, 1967 |first_award=November 4, 1967 |last_award=December 21, 1991 |total=106,462 |posthumous= |recipients= |individual= |higher=[[Order of Lenin]] |same= |lower=[[Order of the Red Banner]] |related= |image2=[[File:Order october revolution rib.png|80px]] |caption2=Ribbon of the Order of the October Revolution }}
The '''Order of the October Revolution''' ({{lang-ru|Орден Октябрьской Революции}}, ''Orden Oktyabr'skoy Revolyutsii'') was instituted on October 31, 1967, in time for the 50th anniversary of the [[October Revolution]]. It was awarded to individuals or groups for services furthering [[communism]] or the state, or in enhancing the defenses of the [[Soviet Union]], military and civil. It is second highest Soviet [[Order (decoration)|orders]], after the [[Order of Lenin]].
[[Image:The Soviet Union 1968 CPA 3665 stamp with label (Order of the October Revolution, Winter Palace capturing and Rocket, with label).jpg|thumb|left|1967 [[USSR]] commemorative stamp]] The order consisted of a badge, which was a [[red star]] with golden rays between the arms; at the centre was a pentagon bearing the image of the [[Cruiser Aurora]] participating in the October Revolution. Above it was a [[red flag (signal)|red flag]] bearing the words "October Revolution" in Russian. A [[Hammer and sickle|Hammer and Sickle]] emblem was placed at the bottom. The badge was worn on the left chest with a red ribbon bearing five blue stripes at the centre.
The [[Russian cruiser Aurora|Russian cruiser ''Aurora'']] was itself awarded with the Order of the October Revolution, the only ship ever to have received the award. Military units and institutions receiving the award applied the order name to their title upon its reception.
==External links== *[http://awards-su.com/index/ord/oct-revol/ru/oct-revol.htm Order of the October Revolution] at the [http://awards-su.com/index/ Directory of the orders, medals and signs of the USSR]. {{ru icon}} *[http://www.soviethonors.com/Order-of-October-Revolution.htm Order of the October Revolution Reference Page]
